thagorthuman ha ayinstayin athara wu sanwada, ayinstayin ethek dara siti samahara mathayan, thagorthuma ha kerunu dirgha sanwadayan ha wenas wu ayuru salaka balana wita ethuman sathu wu shreshtathwaya widaha dakwe. 1915 wasare di thagea්rthuman wetha labunu nayit namaya pa්rathikshepa kale bi්rathanya adhirajyawadaya indiyawa thula karana nopanathkamwalata wirodhayak pamataya.
